scenarios.description: You find yourself in a maze. To your left, a cold draft flows. To your right, you see a faint glimmer of light.
The draft grows stronger, leading you to a dark, narrow corridor.

options.OptionsText: Turn back and try another path

scenarios.description: The light reveals an old torch hanging on the wall beside a locked gate.

options.OptionsText: Take the torch and look for a way to unlock the gate
Ignore the gate and move forward

scenarios.description: Inside the corridor, you find strange symbols on the walls glowing faintly.
Turning back, you stumble upon a hidden door slightly ajar.

options.OptionsText: Close the door and move on

scenarios.description: The torch flickers, illuminating a secret passage to your left.
The corridor opens into a grand hall filled with shadows that seem to move.
The symbols react to your touch, revealing a hidden stairway going down.
Moving forward, you come across a dark pool of water blocking your path.
Entering the hidden door, you find an ancient chest half-buried in the dirt.
Moving on, you find yourself in a hallway filled with mirrors that reflect strange versions of yourself.

options.OptionsText: Avoid the mirrors and hurry through

scenarios.description: The passage leads to an underground river that flows swiftly.
The main path takes you to a room with a single door, marked 'Final Trial.'
In the shadows, you see something glimmering faintly in the darkness.

options.OptionsText: Ignore it and find a way out

scenarios.description: The exit leads you to a series of increasingly narrow passageways.

options.OptionsText: Try to find a wider path

scenarios.description: You find a hidden key that seems to radiate with a faint glow.
Looking into the mirrors, you feel yourself becoming dizzier as strange visions fill your mind.

options.OptionsText: Resist the visions and break free

scenarios.description: The path ahead becomes darker, and you sense a malevolent presence watching you.
As you continue, the maze seems to close in on you, and you feel trapped. The air grows cold, and darkness surrounds you completely. The journey ends here.
After overcoming all challenges, you find a stairway leading up to an exit bathed in sunlight. You've successfully escaped the labyrinth!
